terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators
Class Actuator

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.Actuator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActuationTarget, EnableTarget
public class Actuator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActuationTarget, EnableTarget

A class that controls an attached target node through an actuation value. The target node type, control action and actuation value format are defined by personality plugins. To facilitate status feedback the enable state can be relayed to collateral event targets from an event splitter.

An Actuator is similar in concept to an Interpolator, but the Actuator is controlled programmatically instead of by a time driven alpha value.

The target node controlled by this Actuator should only be manipulated through this Actuator. Setting the target node's state directly will invalidate the state of this Actuator.

initActuation

public void initActuation(javax.vecmath.Tuple4d value)
Description copied from interface: ActuationTarget
Initializes the actuation reference value and target object actuation state to the specified value. The default reference value is specific to the target.

Specified by:
initActuation in interface ActuationTarget
Parameters:
value - Actuation reference value.

updateActuation

public void updateActuation(javax.vecmath.Tuple4d value)
Description copied from interface: ActuationTarget
Updates the target object actuation state to the specified value relative to the actuation reference value. The manner in which the new value is applied to the reference (additive, logarithmic, etc.) is specific to the target.

Specified by:
updateActuation in interface ActuationTarget
Parameters:
value - Actuation update value.

syncActuation

public void syncActuation()
Description copied from interface: ActuationTarget
Synchronizes the actuation reference value with the current target object actuation state. Typically called at the end of a drag operation so that the actuation offset will be cumulative.

Specified by:
syncActuation in interface ActuationTarget
